page.title: 18Leisure Activities
page.content: There are a lot of leisure activities for children in Rainford apart from those which they do at school.There are local soccer teams e.g.Rainford Rangers and Rainford Youth Club,which field teams in a number of age ranges.The youth club itself is open three nights a week providing facilities such as snooker, table tennis and darts. There is a gym club held at Rainford High School every Wednesday night.Rainford Tennis Club has three shale courts and membership is open to all.There are also hard courts provided by the council and open to all on the recreation field in Scarisbrick Road.There are also clubs for those interested in cricket,angling, shooting,karate,ju-jitsu,drama and flower arranging.
